about_the_game:
Enjoy a fun singing party!
Feel like a superstar, celebrate music, and enjoy unforgettable memories with family and friends when you rock the virtual stage together and break the high score!

Songs

Add your own songs in the community grown UltraStar format, or the standardized MIDI format.
The integrated editor and AI tools let you create a sing-along version of any song you like, so you'll never run out of options.

Note however that no songs are included by default, only few files to demonstrate the UltraStar format and gameplay.

Companion App

The free Melody Mania Companion App for Android and iOS provides additional goodies for the game.
  • Use your smartphone as mic. No need to buy new equipment!
  • Search and enqueue songs while others are still playing. No need to interrupt the game flow!
  • Navigate the game remotely. No need to hang around your keyboard!

Game Highlights

  • Score Modes - Challenge your friends or sing cooperatively. As alternative, turn off all ratings to enjoy karaoke without competition.
  • Duet Songs - Sing a duet where both players have different lyrics and notes.
  • Team & Tournament - Play multiple rounds or start a knock-out tournament.
  • Pass the Mic - Switch players in the middle of a song. Fun for groups of all sizes!
  • Song Queue - Play multiple songs from the queue without interruption.
  • Medleys - Play a shortened mix of songs in the queue.
  • Microphone Playback- Play back mic input to hear yourself over the speakers.
  • Mute Vocals - Silence the vocals of any song to enjoy a classic karaoke experience, thanks to AI powered vocals isolation.
  • Embedded Browser - Play with videos on the internet (e.g. YouTube) as alternative to local audio and video files.
  • Modding Support - Melody Mania integrates Steam Workshop and can be extended with custom code to modify (mod) the game.
  • Playlists - Mark songs as favorites and organize your song library with playlists in UltraStar or M3U format.
  • Webcam - Use your camera as background video or take a snapshot for your profile image
  • Song Management - Handle large song libraries by loading songs on demand instead of upfront.

Customizable

Melody Mania was designed to be customizable and extensible. You can not only add your own songs but also your own images, themes, and even code.

Song Editor

Create a sing-along version of any song you like.
  • Isolate vocals, apply speech recognition, and pitch detection via AI
  • Add music notes via button tapping or by dictating lyrics
  • Edit notes via drag & drop
  • Add videos and images
  • Import MIDI files
  • Quickly switch between editing and singing

Supported File Formats
  • Audio files: aac, aiff, flac, m4a, mp3, ogg (recommended), wav, wma
  • Video files: avi, f4v, flv, mkv, mov, mp4, mpg, webm (webm with VP8 recommended), wmv
  • Image files: png, jpg
  • Karaoke files: UltraStar txt (recommended), MIDI with lyrics

Have a Good Time

Don't be afraid, just sing with passion and let the pitch detection guide your voice.
Start now with Melody Mania, soften your lips and let's sing it at the top of our lungs!
This revolution of karaoke never gets old.

Have fun with Melody Mania!

name: Melody Mania

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz, two cores, 64-bit architecture | AVX and AVX2 (for speech recognition only)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Let your talent shine when you sing along your favorite songs in this fun party game! A variety of modes let you play with friends or compete against them. An open song format and AI powered editor tools provide boundless possibilites.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
